title: Medicine Box
description: small wooden box with hinged lid; metal handle, hinges and closure; decorated with painted and low relief carved flag and eagle on top, cross on PR side, feather fan on PL side, rattle and drum on front and feather fan and pipe (?) on back; glass and metal pendant portrait of Jesus attached to lid; lined with blue velvet
creditline: The Dr. Frances E. Schaar Fund in memory of Leon and Anna Schaar
